CLIENTID.description: Discord Client Id. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

BOT_TOKEN.description: Discord BOT token. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

PREFIX.description: Discord Bot Prefix, If you change this please make sure you change it in the config aswell.

OWNERID.description: Owners Id, to assign more than one use comma(,) to separate.
